name: Muslim
description: Muslim Quran is a wonderful platform that allows you to read the entire Quran and recite various supplications, including morning and evening prayers, as well as post-prayer supplications. It also features a radio with a selection of sheikhs and reciters.

name: Savor
description: Savor is a premium restaurant offering a range of services, including delivery and reservations. We take pride in serving a variety of mouthwatering and delightful dishes.

name: Weki Search
description: A site to search for anything on the original Wikipedia site by typing it, even if it is an ace, and there is a page for favorites.

name: Pets Store
description: A site that sells pets, including cats and dogs, their comfort products, and their food

name: Football Quiz
description: My first project with Next.js, built using TypeScript, is a general football trivia app. I incorporated mission-based concepts and various hooks to develop it.

name: Caluclator
description: A simple calculator created using JavaScript only

name: Product Card
description: Dessert products that allow you to put what you like in the basket, choose the quantity, and see the total price, simply and compatible with all screens.

name: Essam Clothes
description: A clothing store offering a wide selection of men's and women's apparel, shoes, and a convenient shopping basket. It features a search function to help you find what you need and includes a login option for personalized access.
